taskDescription: Analysis and resolution of static analysis integration test failures including ESLint 9.x configuration issues, Pylint SARIF output validation, and PowerShell test framework property access errors

keyFixes.solution: Created eslint.config.js flat configuration, backed up .eslintrc.json
Confirmed implementation already includes required columnKind property
Added defensive PSObject.Properties validation for safe property access

newLearnings: Learning #218: PowerShell 5.1 Safe Property Access Patterns

keyImprovements: Pylint integration should pass if Pylint is properly installed
Test framework property access errors eliminated

validation: Confirm ESLint 9.x no longer throws import attribute error
Validate SARIF output structure from all analyzers

response: RECOMMENDATION: TEST - Test-StaticAnalysisIntegration.ps1: Run the updated test suite to validate all static analysis integration fixes including ESLint flat configuration migration, Pylint SARIF structure validation, and PowerShell property access improvements.
